data.convo: Hi ! It's still seven o'clock . Are you crazy ? I got the information that there is a killer sale at the shopping mall near our block . Get up and I will wait for you at the gate of our flat . Every time when you glimpse some stylish clothes , you change into another person . Stop complaining , OK ? No wonder you are named shopaholic . No , I am not a shopaholic , but a super shopaholic . And I really enjoy smelling the gorgeous clothes and new bags . Wait a moment . And you can check where other sales are .
